heading: beatles reunion
subheading: well, not really. but the three surviving liverpool lads are getting together to drum up publicity for a digitally enhanced reissue of yellow submarine, the animated beatles feature movie from 1968. on 8 september, a specially painted yellow train will carry paul, george, and ringo from london to paris (via the chunnel) to coincide with the film's release. digitally enhanced? the original, as we recall, was psychedelically enhanced.
author: wired staff
text: well, not really. but the three surviving liverpool lads are getting together to drum up publicity for a digitally enhanced reissue of  yellow submarine, the animated beatles feature movie from 1968. on 8 september, a specially painted yellow train will carry paul, george, and ringo from london to paris (via the chunnel) to coincide with the film's release. digitally enhanced? the original, as we recall, was psychedelically enhanced.
